description.displayText: Judith C. has worked with me providing assistance with personal care and household management following knee surgery my husband had and on other occasions as well. I am a full time wheelchair user and Judy was very good with transfers, dressing and assist with bathing.  She assisted me also with meal prep and basic household organizational management.  She is pleasant, reliable and happily willing to perform tasks requested.  I would highly recommend Judy.
